GenotypeGraph

Class GenotypeGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • GenotypeGraph.GenotypeGraph
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GenotypeGraphSimple

    public class GenotypeGraph
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class to represent directed graphs about genotypes It also implements a basic dot format output The implementation is with adjacency lists
    Author:
    rossi

    • Constructor Detail

      • GenotypeGraph

        public GenotypeGraph(java.lang.String[] labels,
                     java.util.ArrayList<boolean[]> genotypes)
        default constructor, creates a graph consisting of many genotype nodes
        Parameters:
        labels - list associating each gene's HUGO symbol with a position
        genotypes - note that a single genotype is a sequence of boolean stating if a gene was or wasn't mutated (in the order defined by labels)

      • GenotypeGraph

        public GenotypeGraph(java.lang.String[] labels,
                     java.util.ArrayList<boolean[]> genotypes,
                     int thres)
        Alternate constructor also setting a threshold on the maximum number of genes
        Parameters:
        labels -
        genotypes -

      • GenotypeGraph

        public GenotypeGraph()
        Alternate constructor reading input from STDIN

      • GenotypeGraph

        public GenotypeGraph(int thres)
        Alternate constructor reading input from STDIN and setting a threshold on the maximum number of genes
        Parameters:
        thres - number of genes to keep for the analysis (it selects the most mutated genes)

    • Method Detail

      • getLabels

        public java.lang.String[] getLabels()

      • readInput

        private void readInput()
        reads an input file in "BML" format from STDIN: #samples #genes '\n' spaced list of all HUGO symbols for each gene '\n' sampleID and relative boolean array of mutation presence '\n' (repeated #samples times)

      • reduceGenes

        private void reduceGenes(boolean[] toBeKept,
                         java.util.ArrayList<boolean[]> tempSamples)
        Applies the threshold set by the user to reduce the dataset
        Parameters:
        toBeKept - list of genes to keep an to eliminate (in the first GeneLabelsOrder order)
        tempSamples - original unreduced samples

      • toBoolMatrix

        private boolean[][] toBoolMatrix(java.util.ArrayList<boolean[]> list)
        Casts an ArrayList to a boolean[][]
        Parameters:
        list - (of arrays)
        Returns:
        a matrix

      • computeElimiations

        private boolean[] computeElimiations(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> geneMutations)
        Finds the genes that should be considered according to the threshold set by the user
        Parameters:
        geneMutations - for each gene (in the GeneLabelsOrder order) how many times it is found as mutated in the data set
        Returns:
        list of genes to keep an to eliminate (in the GeneLabelsOrder order)

      • computeGeneMutations

        private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> computeGeneMutations(java.util.ArrayList<boolean[]> tempSamples)
        Computes the array of the counts for each mutation (i.e. how many times every mutation was seen in any sample)
        Parameters:
        tempSamples - input dataset
        Returns:
        array of the counts for each mutation

      • prepareEdges

        protected void prepareEdges()
        prepares the edges of the graph

        public long size()
        Returns:

        print this graph in dot format

      • toDotNode

        public void toDotNode(GenotypeNode node)
        prints a node in dot format
        Parameters:
        node - the node to be printed REQUIRE not null

      • nodeLabel

        public java.lang.String nodeLabel(GenotypeNode node)
        Prints a node referring to mutated genes with their respective HUGO symbols
        Parameters:
        node - the node of which the genotype should be printed REQUIRE not null
        Returns:
        the sequence of HUGO symbols of genes that are mutated in a given genotype

      • setNodes

        protected void setNodes(java.util.ArrayList<GenotypeNode> newNodes)
        updates the node set to a new one (also dot IDs are recomputed)
        Parameters:
        newNodes - new node set
